oai_dc:dc.dc:title: This is the enemy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This poster from World War II shows a male hand holding a dagger that is stabbing a Holy Bible. The arm of the ""enemy"" is wearing a swastika on the sleeve of his uniform.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: World War I and World War II Poster Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; Nazis; Posters
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
